subject: Re: [junit] Exception Error
msgSnippet: hi anupama, set the Junit path to PATH variable, if needed i will give the path setting and class path settings ... With regards Jay anupama
messageBody:
hi anupama,

set the Junit path to PATH variable, if needed i will give the path setting and class path settings ...

With regards
Jay

anupama <anupama@...> wrote:
hi,

Sorry i couldn't understand the procedure which u have asked me to do.I have placed all my files in the same directory of junit3.8.1.In junit3.8.1,junit (samples folder),junit.jar and src.jar files are placed.

Actually i have set the path as< C:\j2sdk1.4.0_02\lib;C:\junit3.8.1\junit3.8.1\junit.jar;\C:\Documents and Settings\Anupama\Desktop\Junit3.8.1\junit3.8.1\junit\samples>

After compiling i am running AllTests.java file in command prompt as c:\java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests.After running it is displaying an error as"Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:junit/Textui/TestRunner

Please give me the solution.

Anupama
